committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: Of inquiry requesting the President to transmit to the House of Representatives all information in the possession of the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency relating to nutrient management of the Illinois River Watershed, Arkansas and Oklahoma.

summary.text: Requests the President to transmit to the House of Representatives copies of all technical and scientific documentation in the possession of the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) relating to the Administrator's technical and scientific rationale for the establishment of a total phosphorous limit of 0.1 milligram per liter for the Northwest Arkansas Conservation Authority wastewater treatment facility, Arkansas.

titles.title: Of inquiry requesting the President to transmit to the House of Representatives all information in the possession of the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency relating to nutrient management of the Illinois River Watershed, Arkansas and Oklahoma.
